name: Colorblind
description:
Brief Overview:

Colorblind is a traditional 2D-puzzle platformer, but with a twist. The game has four camera screens, and each camera can only see certain colors. Players must look at any combination of cameras at a time to solve puzzles throughout the game.

Controls:

Movement: "WASD"

Jump: Spacebar

Crouch: Control (crouches are maintained until jumped out of)

Uncrouch: Spacebar

Developers (Team 5):

Adam Beck, Jason Harnack, Frank Hucek, James Vaughn
